alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:25PM CDT until May 12 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Holt County in north central Nebraska... Boyd County in north central Nebraska... Northern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Atkinson to 8 miles northeast of Chambers to near Clearwater, moving north at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... O`neill, Spencer, O`Neill, Atkinson, Ewing, Butte, Chambers, Lynch, Page, Gross, Amelia, Inman, Bristow, Emmet, Anoka, Monowi, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Opportunity, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Midway. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 284 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 151 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 106 and 144. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
